title: Ciara
summary: Ciara Princess Wilson[1] (/siˈɛərə/ see-AIR-ə;[2] née Harris, born October 25, 1985)[3][4] is an American singer, songwriter, dancer, model and actress.[5] Born in Fort Hood, Texas,[6] her family eventually settled to Atlanta, Georgia, where she joined the girl group Hearsay. She later signed a publishing deal and befriended producer Jazze Pha, who recorded demos that would appear on her debut album. With his help, Ciara signed a record deal with LaFace Records.
